snippet: The Walnut Street Theater in Philadelphia will present the American premiere of “Love Story, The Musical” in September.
abstract: Walnut Street Theater in Philadelphia will present the American premiere of Stephen Clark musical Love Story.
lead_paragraph: The Walnut Street Theater in Philadelphia will present the American premiere of “Love Story, The Musical” in September.

headline.main: ‘Love Story, the Musical’ Heading to Philadelphia
headline.print_headline: ‘Love Story, The Musical’ Heading to Philadelphia
